{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$895.6K in 2021-2022** on contracts with DEFENSE INFORMATION SYSTEMS AGENCY.

Across 2 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 1 have at least one amendment (50%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 43% and the average number of amendments was 3. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$196.6K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 6.67 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$3.6M. The longest contract was 7.77 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$6.6M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}

{{< /details >}}
